changelog: Added support for qs-inventory weapons (ESX only)
'Wanted' tag to citizen profiles with active warrants or BOLOs
Only active warrants and BOLOs are now visible on citizen profiles
Changed the name of the prop
Fixed incidents/announcements descriptions not saving after closing the MDT
Fixed issue causing MDT to crash in the management tab due to activity
Fixed bug causing MDT to crash when creating a warrant without a house in the housing scripts
